law.catch_line: Invalidity of contracts for solid waste management when in conflict with chapter.
law.text: Each contract or renewal of existing contract for solid waste management in the Commonwealth shall be void to the extent that it conflicts with any provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 48, effective February 26, 1991.
